title.rendered: BMC Software India Pvt Ltd supports Smile Foundation’s Skilling Programme

content.rendered:
BMC Software India Pvt Ltd supports Smile Foundation's Skilling Programme

Since January 2020, BMC Software India Pvt. Ltd. has been a steadfast supporter of Smile Foundation’s Smile Twin eLearning Programme (STeP). In Bengaluru, the partnership is currently empowering 140 underprivileged youth through this comprehensive employability training program. The training encompasses various skills relevant to the retail and service sectors. Upon completion, these trained individuals will have the opportunity to secure employment with renowned brands in these industries. BMC Software India Pvt. Ltd.’s support has played a crucial role in providing these young individuals with the necessary training and opportunities for a brighter future.
